articles.description: Aaron Rodgers loves to needle Bears fans whenever possible, but even he had to admit Justin Fields looks legit.
articles.content: Aaron Rodgers remains in complete control of the rivalry between the Chicago Bears and the Green Bay Packers. However, he wasn’t the primary reason they won on Sunday. That came courtesy of their ste… [+2078 chars]
